affirmations: I am not my thoughts, and I am not my struggles—I am so much more.
Even on my hardest days, I am worthy of love and care.
I give myself permission to rest, to heal, and to move at my own pace.
I am surrounded by love, even when I can’t see it.
I am allowed to ask for help, and I am not a burden.
I am growing, even when it feels like I am standing still.
My feelings are valid, but they do not define me.
I don’t have to earn love—it’s already mine.
I am surrounded by people who care about me, even when my mind tries to tell me otherwise.
I am cherished more than I will ever fully understand.
